# Readings

Mandatory readings for this week are:

-   Bechtel, M. M., Scheve, K. F., & van Lieshout, E. (2022). Improving public support for climate action through multilateralism. Nature Communications, 13(1), 6441. \[[Download via ILIAS](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1368439_download&client_id=ILIAS)\]

-   Harrison, K., & Sundstrom, L. M. (2007). The comparative politics of climate change. Global Environmental Politics, 7(4), 1-18. \[[Download via ILIAS](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1368440_download&client_id=ILIAS)\]

Further readings and materials include:

-   Chan, G., Stavins, R., & Ji, Z. (2018). International climate change policy. Annual Review of Resource Economics, 10, 335-360.
